jobs.title: Partner Manager
jobs.requirements_and_qualifications: The position requires 1-3+ years of experience in sales, account management, or program operations, preferably with experience working with construction professionals or home services businesses. The role involves building relationships with contractors, training them on rebate programs and software, and monitoring their performance to ensure compliance and program success.
